text.section: An individual who applies for search, contact, and reunion services shall execute a written agreement with a confidential intermediary concerning the provision of search, contact, and reunion services.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, the confidential intermediary may charge the individual a reasonable fee for search, contact, and reunion services.
The overall amount of fees collected may not exceed the costs of providing the services.

The confidential intermediary may not charge a director of a local department who applies for search, contact, and reunion services on behalf of a minor in out-of-home placement the fee described in paragraph (1) of this subsection.

text.section:
The confidential intermediary shall promptly:
file the executed agreement with the Director; and
attempt to contact the adopted individual, the biological parent, or the sibling sought by the applicant.
